sect2.title: Vim Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: as, ld, strip Diffutils: cmp, diff Fileutils: chmod, cp, ln, mkdir, mv, rm, touch Find: find Gcc: cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Make: make Net-tools: hostname Sed: sed Sh-utils: echo, expr, uname, whoami Textutils: cat, tr, wc
